meanings.definition: A person or thing that makes an action or process easier or more efficient.
meanings.sent1: The facilitators in the workshop provided helpful guidance to the participants.
meanings.sent2: The facilitators of the event ensured everything ran smoothly.
meanings.sent3: The facilitators of the meeting were like friendly guides leading the way.
meanings.sent4: The facilitators acted as bridges, connecting different parts of the project.
meanings.sent5: The facilitators were like puzzle pieces, fitting perfectly to improve the outcome.

meanings.definition: A person who helps a group of people to work together more effectively.
meanings.sent1: The facilitators at the team-building retreat encouraged collaboration among the employees.
meanings.sent2: The facilitators of the group discussion kept everyone engaged and on track.
meanings.sent3: The facilitators of the team were like cheerleaders, boosting morale and unity.
meanings.sent4: The facilitators were like conductors, orchestrating harmony within the team.
meanings.sent5: The facilitators acted as catalysts, sparking synergy among the group members.
